gui

Class GuiEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.GuiEnvironment

  • public class GuiEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    GUI model which holds the game data and interfaces between the GUI view/controller and the background classes containing the game logic and objects.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
